languages.text: "Битва на "Бессердечном" была тяжелым испытанием, но мы победили! Что, как не триумф вопреки всему, вдохновляет на новые подвиги?"

traits.locale_text: "Битва на "Бессердечном" была тяжелым испытанием, но мы победили! Что, как не триумф вопреки всему вдохновляет на новые подвиги?"

languages.text: "The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"
languages.original_text: "Битва на "Бессердечном" была тяжелым испытанием, но мы победили! Что, как не триумф вопреки всему, вдохновляет на новые подвиги?"

traits.locale_text: "The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"
"The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"
"The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"
"The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"
"The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"
"The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"

languages.text: 「ハートレスでの戦いは困難な試練だったけど、私たちは勝利したよ！絶望的な状況を覆しての勝利ほど、新たな栄光の行いへと私たちを奮い立たせるものはないよね？」
languages.original_text: "The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"

traits.locale_text: 「ハートレスでの戦いは困難な試練だったけど、私たちは勝利したよ！絶望的な状況を覆しての勝利ほど、新たな栄光の行いへと私たちを奮い立たせるものはないよね？」

languages.text: "Der Kampf an Bord der Heartless war eine schwierige Prüfung, doch wir haben sie bestanden! Nichts inspiriert derart zu neuen ruhmreichen Taten wie ein Triumph gegen große Widrigkeiten, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Kampf an Bord der Heartless war eine schwierige Prüfung, doch wir haben sie bestanden! Nichts inspiriert derart zu neuen ruhmreichen Taten wie ein Triumph gegen große Widrigkeiten, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: « Une épreuve redoutable nous attendait à bord du Sans-Cœur, mais nous l'avons surmontée ! Quoi de mieux qu'un triomphe contre toute attente pour nous inspirer des exploits toujours plus glorieux ? »
languages.original_text: "The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"

traits.locale_text: « Une épreuve redoutable nous attendait à bord du Sans-Cœur, mais nous l'avons surmontée ! Quoi de mieux qu'un triomphe contre toute attente pour nous inspirer des exploits toujours plus glorieux ? »

languages.text: «¡La batalla a bordo de la Desalmada ha sido una difícil prueba, pero hemos salido victoriosos! ¿Verdad que no hay nada como un triunfo contra toda adversidad para inspirarnos a alcanzar nuevas cotas de gloria?».
languages.original_text: "The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"

traits.locale_text: «¡La batalla a bordo de la Desalmada ha sido una difícil prueba, pero hemos salido victoriosos! ¿Verdad que no hay nada como un triunfo contra toda adversidad para inspirarnos a alcanzar nuevas cotas de gloria?».

languages.text: “无心号上的战斗是一场艰难的考验，但我们胜利了！我们克服了所有困难，取得了胜利，朝着未来的荣耀前进！还有比这更鼓舞人心的事情吗？”
languages.original_text: "The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"

traits.locale_text: “无心号上的战斗是一场艰难的考验，但我们胜利了！我们克服了所有困难，取得了胜利，朝着未来的荣耀前进！还有比这更鼓舞人心的事情吗？”

languages.text: "Taşkalp'te verilen savaş zorlu bir sınav olsa da üstesinden geldik! Her şeye rağmen galip gelmek, nice şanlı zaferlerin yolunu açacak!"
languages.original_text: "The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"

traits.locale_text: "Taşkalp muhaberesi zorlu bir sınavdı ama üstesinden geldik! Her şeye rağmen galip gelmek, nice şanlı zaferlerin yolunu açacak!"

languages.original_text: "The battle aboard the Heartless was a difficult trial, but we prevailed! Is there anything like a triumph against all odds to inspire us to new deeds of glory?"
